game.name: Multiverse Loot Hunter

game.shortDescription: This is a brush treasure adventure game across the heavens. The protagonist awakens his powers and freely passes through different planes such as Xiuxian, history, Wuxia, magic, and future. Collect equipment, spirits, characters and cheats distributed across all planes through battle.

reviewHighlights.text: 방대한 방치형 게임 게임디자인이 매우 치밀함 ㅋㅋㅋ영어로 하는데 도움말 번역이 안돼서 게임시스템을 박아가면서 추리해야함ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅅㅂ
